If the specified profile is not supported, the default profile will be used.--> <UseDefaultStreamProfile>false</UseDefaultStreamProfile> <!--Width of the resolution, int type--> <Width>1920</Width> <!--Height of the resolution, int type--> <Height>1080</Height> <!--Frame rate, int type--> <FPS>30</FPS> <!--frame format--> <Format>MJPG</Format>
